name: Finite field

In mathematics, a finite field or Galois field (so-named in honor of Ã‰variste Galois) is a field that has a finite number of elements.  As with any field, a finite field is a set on which the operations of multiplication, addition, subtraction and division are defined and satisfy certain basic rules.
